sentences.sContent: Now you just alternate layers of that mixture and eggplant.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now you just alternate layers of that mixture and eggplant.
sentences.sCn: 现在你只需把茄子和拌料一层层交替放好。

sentences.sContent: The amount of time needed for these tasks will vary and perhaps it would be better to alternate them each weekend to lessen the workload.
sentences.sContent_eng: The amount of time needed for these tasks will vary and perhaps it would be better to alternate them each weekend to lessen the workload.
sentences.sCn: 所有这些工作所耗费的时间是无法确定的，或许在每个周末交替着选用其中几个方法会减少工作量。

phrases.pCn: 在两种状态中交替变化；时而…时而…

remMethod.val: alter(其他的)+n+ate→换成其他的→交替的

words.tran: 供选择的；选择性的；交替的
交替地；轮流地；隔一个地
二中择一；供替代的选择

trans.tranOther: if two things alternate, or if you alternate them, they happen one after the other in a repeated pattern
two alternate things are placed one after the other in a regular pattern
